name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Roger K. SNYDER, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Roger K. SNYDER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John P. Karoly, Jr., Allentown, for appellant.
Ronald T. Williamson, Chief, Appeals Div., Norristown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 743
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Roger K. SNYDER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
John P. Karoly, Jr., Allentown, for appellant.
Ronald T. Williamson, Chief, Appeals Div., Norristown, for appellee.
